product_name: REI Merino Wool Crew Hiking Socks - Kids'
long_description: These REI merino wool crew hiking socks are made for all-season comfort and insulation. They are constructed of a blend of merino wool, recycled polyester and nylon for soft, breathable cushioning. Nonirritating merino wool insulates, wicks away moisture and resists odors-naturally! Recycled polyester, nylon and a touch of spandex add durability and stretch. Uniquely formed toe area and "no feel" seams keeps socks smooth to help fight blisters. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: These REI merino wool crew hiking socks are made for all-season comfort and insulation. They are constructed of a blend of merino wool, recycled polyester and nylon for soft, breathable cushioning.
